DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim research study compare efficacy ( reduction HbA1c blood glucose level ) insulin detemir , insulin aspart biphasic insulin aspart 30 , add current OAD ( oral anti-diabetic drug ) treatment subject type 2 diabetes verify safety use ( number severity episodes hypoglycaemia , body weight side effect ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Insulin Detemir , Insulin Aspart Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 With OAD Treatment Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart , insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Insulin naive On OAD treatment least 4 month metformin , sulphonylurea combination Body Mass Index ( BMI ) equal 40.0 kg/m2 HbA1c ( glycosylated haemoglobin ) : 7.0 % 10 % ( inclusive ) Proliferative retinopathy Recurrent major hypoglycaemia Cardial problem Uncontrolled hypertension Impaired hepatic renal function
